Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Hi, Quistis.”
Quistis{Line}“Well, these are the{Line} members of Squad B.”
Zell{Line}“Nice to meet ya!”
{Char Squall}{Line}“Pleased to meet you...”

Monologue.Current: Сю{Line}“{Char Seifer}, который это уже раз?”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Seifer, how many times has it been now?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“О, я просто обожаю эти экзамены...”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Oh, I just love these exams...”

Monologue.Current: Сю{Line}“Я объясню текущую ситуацию и задание.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“I’ll explain the current situation{Line} and the mission.”
Xu{Line}“Be seated!”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“Our client for this mission is the{Line} {Term Dollet} Dukedom Parliament.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Our client for this mission is the{Line} {Term Dollet} Dukedom Parliament.”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“A request for SeeD was made{Line} 18 hours ago.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“A request for SeeD was made{Line} 18 hours ago.”
Seifer{Line}“So, what are WE supposed to do?”

Monologue.Current: Сю{Line}“Кандидаты в сиды должны{Line} выявить и устранить оставшихся{Line} гальбадианских солдат в черте города.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“SeeD candidates are to eliminate the{Line} G-Army inside the city.”
Zell{Line}“Sounds important!”
Seifer{Line}“Sounds boring.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“В общем, делаем{Line} всю грязную работу...”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“So what you’re saying is,{Line} we do all the little, dirty work...”

Monologue.Current: Сю{Line}“Мы почти на месте.”{Next}“Бои начнутся сразу{Line} после высадки. Готовьтесь.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“We’re almost there.”{Next}“We anticipate a battle as soon as we {Line} disembark. Just be prepared.”

Monologue.Current: Сю{Line}“Да, наверное, это и так понятно, но...”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Oh, it hardly needs to be said, but...”
“The order to withdraw takes priority.{Line} Do not forget.”

Monologue.Current: Сю{Line}“На этом всё.”{Next}“По любым вопросам{Line} обращайтесь к {Char Quistis}.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“That’s all.”{Next}“Any questions,{Line} talk to Quistis.”

Monologue.Current: (Хм...){Line}Поговорить с {Char Quistis}{Line}Поговорить с {Char Seifer}ом{Line}Поговорить с {Char Zell}ом{Line}Ничего не делать
Monologue.Original: (Hmmm...){Line}Talk to Quistis{Line}Talk to Seifer{Line}Talk to Zell{Line}Do nothing
Quistis{Line}“What is it, {Char Squall}?”{Line}Explain that again{Line}It’s nothing
Quistis{Line}“Here’s a quick explanation.”
Quistis{Line}“This is the last time.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Ваша задача - очистить{Line} город от гальбадианских солдат.”{Next}“Приказ отступать имеет наивысший{Line} приоритет. При его получении вы{Line} должны немедленно вернуться на побережье.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“The goal for this mission is to eliminate the{Line} Galbadian forces that have entered {Term Dollet}.”{Next}“The order to withdraw takes priority.{Line} Be sure to make your way back to the{Line} shore when you get this order.”
Quistis{Line}“You understand now?{Line} That’s it.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Мы скоро прибудем на место.{Line} Будьте готовы ко всему.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“We’ll be there soon.{Line} Be ready for anything, {Char Squall}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Слушайте внимаетльно.”{Next}“Нам поручили перерезать{Line} всех гальбадианцев в Доллете.{Line} Дерьмовая работёнка...”{Next}“Но всё, что от вас требуется - {Line} выполнять мои приказы,{Line} приказы капитана.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Listen up.”{Next}“Our goal for this mission{Line} is to mop up all the{Line} Galbadian soldiers{Line} still left in {Term Dollet}.”{Next}“All you boys have to do{Line} is take orders from me,{Line} the captain.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Моё первое настоящее сражение...{Line} Я немного нервничаю.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“My first real battle...{Line} I’m gettin’ pretty nervous.”
Seifer{Line}“Better not piss in your pants.”
Zell{Line}“Hah!?{Line} You talkin’ to me?”
Seifer{Line}“Heh heh...”
Zell{Line}“...Bastard.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Так, хватит болтать.”{Next}“До высадки осталось немного.{Line} Приготовьтесь.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Ok, enough talk.”{Next}“We’ll be landing pretty soon.{Line} Get ready.”
“We’ll be landing pretty soon.{Line} Get ready.”
{Char Squall}{Line}“Alright.”
Zell{Line}“Roger.”
Seifer{Line}“Yeah, yeah...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Эй, {Char Squall}.{Line} Посмотри, как там дела снаружи.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Well then, {Char Squall}.{Line} Go see what’s going on outside.”
{Char Squall}{Line}“.........”{Line}......Ok{Line}No
{Char Squall}{Line}“......Ok.”
Seifer{Line}“Good.{Line} Because it’s MY order.”
{Char Squall}{Line}“......No.”
Seifer{Line}“This is an order from your captain,{Line} {Char Squall}. Now go outside.”
